name: Fairy Bakery Workshop
storyline:
One day, my grandma gave me a bakery that was on the verge of bankruptcy.
We don’t have flour, and the shop is in a mess!
Bring back to your own bakery in this city full of fluffy soft creatures!
I can make various breads.
I can collect furniture and renovate my shop.
You can change your clothes.
Various interesting items can be collected through the lucky draw system.
We try to minimize advertising, not forcing advertising to appear.
summary:
Be a full-fledged bakery owner
You can experience everything from harvesting wheat in the field to renovating the store.
A free simulation game to create a cute bakery!
